At the Ai4 2024 conference held at MGM Grand, Las Vegas from August 12-14, Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson held a speech, focusing on the challenges of merging blockchain and AI. Hoskinson argued that blockchain could fundamentally underpin AI by providing a decentralized marketplace for data, models, and inference, thereby serving as an essential incentive and trust layer. ‚ÄúAI could leverage blockchain as an incentive & trust layer to build decentralized marketplaces for data, models and inference,‚Äù Pellerin quoted Hoskinson as saying.

entry.title: Iran Offers $20 Reward To Citizens Who Can Report Underground Crypto Miners
entry.summary:
A serious power crisis is what Iran is currently going through, and an unprecedented heatwave only serves to further deteriorate the situation. In a bizarre bid to crack down on this issue, the government of Iran has just announced a $20 bounty for citizens to act as informants on illegal cryptocurrency mining operations within the country.
One state-run electricity company has already started this campaign: Tavanir. It fights the unauthorized consumption of subsidized electricity, which officials say contributes to ongoing power shortages hounding the country.
Heatwave And Power Shortages
The current heatwave has pushed temperatures in Iran to a scorching 49.7¬∞C, or 121¬∞F, the hottest period to have hit in 50 years. This brought about rampant power outages, which affected daily li‚Ä¶

entry.summary:

entry.title: Bitfinex Partners with Komainu for Digital Asset Custody Solutions
entry.summary: Bitfinex has announced plans to integrate Komainu Connect, a regulated digital asset custodian. Supported by Ledger Tradelink According to Bitfinex, this partnership is made possible by Ledger Enterprise's off-exchange trading and settlement technology, Ledger Tradelink. This technology will allow Bitfinex's institutional customers to trade without frequently moving assets on-chain. By integrating with Komainu Connect, Bitfinex has promised users access to the liquid crypto markets while their assets remain stored with Komainu, a regulated custodian. entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +0m, ETH ETFs: -$77m. Crypto falls after Fed, Trump speech & Iran threats. Mt. Gox still has $2.1bn BTC after distributions. Lummis introduces bill to buy 1m BTC. Large BTC holders bought $5.4bn in July. Tether makes $1.3bn profit in Q2. DeFi loans hit 2022 levels. Base sees 80% of active Uniswap traders. $900m of altcoin unlocks this month. Elixir launches deUSD as rival to Ethena.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 169 - NEIRO HITS $100M!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$18m, ETH ETFs: +$34m. Mt. Gox move another $3bn BTC, prices stable. ETH ETFs see net inflow as Grayscale outflow slows. BTC exchange reserves hit multi-year low. XRP up 7% ahead of potential SEC settlement. UAE banks integrate crypto trading. Bybit integrates USDe with up to 20% yield. California DMV puts 42m car titles on AVAX. BTC mining to be a $20bn industry: Bernstein. Russia legalises various crypto activities. Terra blockchain halted, Astro faces $6.8m exploit. Trump raised $21m at BTC conference.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 168 - SEC DROPS SOL CLAIMS
entry.summary: BTC falls to $66k after government moves $2bn BTC. Transfer most likely just a new custodian. SEC plans to drop charges SOL is a security. SOL ETF not happening in near term: BlackRock. ETFs to hit model portfolios later this year: BlackRock. Grayscale ETH ETF outflows slow marginally. Tron surpasses ETH & SOL for 24hr revenue. Pump(.)fun revenue beats ETH. BTC future tied to the elections: Jeffries. Polymarket hits $1bn betting volume. Polymarket integrates with Substack. Binance Labs announce 7th season of incubations. There is merit to Bitcoin and other coins: Elon. DeFi coins rise as MKR votes to share fees. COMP agrees to share fees with token holders.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 167 - CHATTING TO DOODLES!
entry.summary: BTC nears $70k after Trump speech, PoW alts soar. Crypto funds saw $245m inflows last week. Open Interest on BTC hits record $39.4bn. SOL overtakes ETH in several key metrics. Pump(.)fun overtakes ETH for daily revenue. Jito overtakes Lido for fees collected. $1.5bn altcoin unlocks in August, $600m XRP. Compound DAO faces $25m governance attack. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week.

entry.title: New Technology Is Making Bionic Limbs More Affordable
entry.summary: Alt Bionics founder and CEO Ryan Saavedra talks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about the Genesis Hand, an affordable $5,000 bionic limb designed for daily use.

entry.title: The Story of Solana Meme Coin Billy
entry.summary: Billy is the largest Solana meme coin on Pumpdotfun, peaking at a market cap of over $200 million. But it wasn‚Äôt always smooth sailing. Minutes after launching Billy‚Äôs dev abandoned him and sold the majority of their tokens. At the time, the tokens were worth $1,116 but at today‚Äôs value they‚Äôd be worth more than $8.65 million.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 166 - CRYPTO AND STOCKS FALL
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$44m, ETH ETFs: -$133m. ETH falls as Grayscale ETF outflows continue. ETH ETFs still see $1bn of daily volume. Liquidations hit $250m in sell-off. ETH Open Interest hits ATH at CME. BTC whales have bought $23bn in July. SOL weekly active addresses hits ATH. Bitstamp to distribute Mt. Gox BTC today. Russia to legalise crypto mining & payments. Lummis set to introduce BTC strategic reserve bill. Harris will not be at Bitcoin Nashville. BTC going to $52m by 2050: VanEck. Hashdex file for mixed BTC & ETH ETF. Coinbase to make tokenised treasuries fund. Polymarket partners with Moonpay for on-ramp. Ferrari accepts crypto in Europe. Bitfarms stopped in poison-pill strategy. Riot buys another miner for $93m.
